1.verse_text: Happy is the person who doesn"t listen to the wicked. He doesn"t go where sinners go. He doesn"t do what bad people do. He thinks about those teachings day and night. It produces fruit in season. Its leaves don"t die. Everything he does will succeed. They are like useless chaff that the wind blows away. Sinners will not worship God with good people. But the wicked will be destroyed.
He is strong, like a tree planted by a river.
But wicked people are not like that.
So the wicked will not escape God"s punishment.
This is because the Lord protects good people.

2.verse_text: Why are the nations so angry? Why are the people making useless plans? Their leaders make plans together against the Lord and his appointed king. Let"s throw off the ropes that tie us,' the nations say. He makes fun of them. He frightens them with his anger. He will rule in Jerusalem on my holy mountain.' He said to me, 'You are my son. Today I have become your father. All the people on earth will be yours. You will break them into pieces like pottery.' Rulers, learn this lesson. Be happy, but tremble. Otherwise you will be destroyed. He can quickly become angry. But happy are those who trust him for protection.
The kings of the earth prepare to fight.
'Let"s break the chains that hold us prisoners.
But the Lord in heaven laughs.
He says, 'I have appointed my own king!
Now I will tell you what the Lord has declared:
If you ask me, I will give you the nations.
You will make them obey you by punishing them with an iron rod.
Obey the Lord with great fear.
Show that you are loyal to his son.

3.verse_text: Lord, I have many enemies! Many people have turned against me. They say, 'God won"t rescue him.' Selah You are my wonderful God who gives me courage. And he will answer me from his holy mountain. Selah And I will wake up again because the Lord protects me. But I am not afraid. My God, come save me! You have hit my enemies on the cheek. You have broken the teeth of the wicked. Lord, bless your people. Selah
Many people are talking about me.
But, Lord, you are my shield.
I will pray to the Lord.
I can lie down and go to sleep.
Thousands of enemies may surround me.
The Lord can save his people.

4.verse_text: Answer me when I pray to you, my God who does what is right. Lift the load that I carry. Be kind to me and hear my prayer. You love what is false, and you look for new lies. Selah The Lord listens when I pray to him. Think about these things quietly as you go to bed. Selah And trust the Lord. 'Who will give us anything good? Lord, be kind to us.' I am happier than they are, even with all their grain and wine. Lord, only you keep me safe.
People, how long will you turn my honor into shame?
You know that the Lord has chosen for himself those who are loyal to him.
When you are angry, do not sin.
Do what is right as a sacrifice to the Lord.
But you have made me very happy.
I go to bed and sleep in peace.

5.verse_text: Lord, listen to my words. Understand what I am thinking. My king and my God, I pray to you. Every morning, I tell you what I need. And I wait for your answer. You do not live with those who do evil. You hate all those who do wrong. The Lord hates those who kill and trick others. I can come into your Temple. Because I fear and respect you, I can worship in your holy Temple. show me the right thing to do. Show me clearly how you want me to live. In their hearts they want to destroy people. Their throats are like open graves. They use their tongues for telling lies. Let them fall into their own traps. Send them away because their sins are many. They have turned against you. Let them sing glad songs forever. Protect those who love you. They are happy because of you. You protect them like a soldier"s shield.
Listen to my cry for help.
Lord, every morning you hear my voice.
You are not a God who is pleased with what is wicked.
Those people who make fun of you cannot stand before you.
Lord, since I have many enemies,
With their mouths my enemies do not tell the truth.
But let everyone who trusts you be happy.
Lord, you bless those who do what is right.

6.verse_text: Lord, don"t correct me when you are angry. Don"t punish me when you are very angry. Heal me, Lord, because my bones ache. Lord, how long will it be? Save me because of your kindness. Those in the grave don"t praise you. Every night my bed is wet with tears. My bed is soaked from my crying. They are weak from crying about my enemies. The Lord has heard my crying. The Lord will answer my prayer. They will turn and suddenly leave in shame.
Lord, be kind to me because I am weak.
I am tired of crying to you.
My eyes are weak from so much crying.
Get away from me, all you who do evil.
The Lord has heard my cry for help.
All my enemies will be ashamed and troubled.

7.verse_text: Lord my God, I trust in you for protection. Save me and rescue me from those who are chasing me. They will rip me to pieces, and no one can save me. Have my hands done something wrong? Have I stolen from my enemy? Let him trample me into the dust. Let him bury me in the ground. Selah Stand up against my enemies" anger. Get up and demand fairness. and rule them from above. Lord, defend me. Prove that I am right. Show that I have done no wrong, God Most High. You know our thoughts and feelings. Stop those wicked actions done by evil people. And help those who do what is right. He saves those whose hearts are right. And God is always ready to punish the wicked. God will sharpen his sword. He will string his bow and take aim. He has made his flaming arrows. They plan trouble and tell lies. But they will fall into it themselves. The violence they cause will hurt only themselves. I sing praises to the name of the Lord Most High.
Otherwise, they will tear me apart like a lion.
Lord my God, what have I done?
Have I done wrong to my friend?
If I have, let my enemy chase me and capture me.
Lord, rise up in your anger.
God, you do what is right.
God Most High protects me like a shield.
God judges by what is right.
If they do not change their lives,
He has prepared his deadly weapons.
There are people who think up evil.
They dig a hole to trap other people.
They themselves will get into trouble.
I praise the Lord because he does what is right.

8.verse_text: Lord our Master, your name is the most wonderful name in all the earth! It brings you praise in heaven above. to sing praises to you. This is because of your enemies. And so you silence your enemies and destroy those who try to get even. which you made with your hands. I see the moon and stars, which you created. Why do you take care of human beings? And you crowned him with glory and honor. You put all things under his control: and the wild animals, the fish in the sea, and everything that lives under water. your name is the most wonderful name in all the earth!
You have taught children and babies
But why is man important to you?
You made man a little lower than the angels.
You put him in charge of everything you made.

9.verse_text: I will praise you, Lord, with all my heart. I will tell all the miracles you have done. God Most High, I will sing praises to your name. They are overwhelmed and die because of you. You sat on your throne and judged by what was right. and destroyed the wicked people. You wiped out their names forever and ever. You destroyed their cities. No one even remembers them. He sits on his throne to judge. He will decide what is fair for the nations. He protects them in times of trouble. He will not leave those who come to him. Tell the nations what he has done. He will not forget the cries of those who suffer. See how my enemies hurt me. Do not let me go through the gates of death. I will rejoice because you saved me. Their feet are caught in the nets they laid. The wicked get trapped by what they do. Higgaion. Selah So will all those who forget God. The hopes of the poor will not die. Don"t let humans think they are strong. The nations must learn that they are only human. Selah
I will be happy because of you.
My enemies turn back.
You have heard what I complained to you about.
You spoke strongly against the foreign nations
The enemy is gone forever.
But the Lord rules forever.
The Lord will judge the world by what is right.
The Lord defends those who suffer.
Those who know the Lord trust him.
Sing praises to the Lord who is king on Mount Zion.
He remembers who the murderers are.
Lord, be kind to me.
Then, at the gates of Jerusalem, I will praise you.
The nations have fallen into the pit they dug.
The Lord has made himself known by his fair decisions.
Wicked people will go to the grave.
Those who have troubles will not be forgotten.
Lord, rise up and judge the nations.
Teach them to fear you, Lord.

10.verse_text: Lord, why are you so far away? Why do you hide when there is trouble? The wicked set traps to catch them. They bless the greedy but hate the Lord. They do not look for God. There is no room for God in their thoughts. They are far from keeping your laws. They make fun of their enemies. I will never be ruined.' They use their tongues for sin and evil. They look for innocent people to kill. They watch in secret for the helpless. They wait to catch poor people. They catch the poor in nets. They are defeated because the others are stronger. 'God has forgotten us. He doesn"t see what is happening.' Don"t forget those who need help. They say to themselves, 'God won"t punish us.' Look at them and do something. People in trouble look to you for help. You are the one who helps the orphans. Punish them for the evil they have done. Remove from your land those nations that do not worship you. Do what they ask. Listen to them. Then they will no longer be afraid of evil people.
Proudly the wicked chase down those who suffer.
They brag about the things they want.
The wicked people are too proud.
They say to themselves, 'Nothing bad will ever happen to me.
Their mouths are full of curses, lies and threats.
They wait in hiding like a lion.
The poor are thrown down and crushed.
Lord, rise up and punish the wicked.
Why do wicked people hate God?
Lord, surely you see these cruel and evil things.
Break the power of wicked men.
The Lord is King forever and ever.
Lord, you have heard what the poor people want.
Protect the orphans. Put an end to suffering.

11.verse_text: I trust in the Lord for protection. So why do you say to me, 'Fly like a bird to your mountain. They set their arrows on the bowstrings. They shoot from dark places at those who are honest. what can good people do?' The Lord sits on his throne in heaven. And he sees what people do. He keeps his eye on them. But he hates the wicked and those who love to hurt others. Burning sulfur and a whirlwind is what they will get. So honest people will see his face.
Like hunters, the wicked string their bows.
When all that is good falls apart,
The Lord is in his holy temple.
The Lord tests those who do right.
He will send hot coals on the wicked.
The Lord does what is right, and he loves justice.

12.verse_text: Save me, Lord, because the good people are all gone. No true believers are left on earth. They say one thing and mean another. He will cut off those bragging tongues. We can say what we wish. No one is our master.' 'I will now rise up because the poor are being hurt. Because of the moans of the helpless, I will give them the help they want.' They are like silver purified by fire, like silver purified seven times over. Always protect us from such people. Everyone loves what is wrong.
The Lord will stop those lying lips.
They say, 'Our tongues will help us win.
The wicked are all around us.

13.verse_text: How long will you forget me, Lord? How long will you hide from me? Forever? How long must I feel sad in my heart? How long will my enemy win over me? Answer me, my God. Tell me, or I will die. Those against me will rejoice that I"ve been defeated. My heart is happy because you saved me. because he has taken care of me.
Otherwise my enemy will say, 'I have won!'

14.verse_text: A wicked fool says to himself, 'There is no God.' Fools are evil. They do terrible things. None of them does anything good. He looked to see if anyone was wise, if anyone was looking to God for help. Together, everyone has become evil. None of them does anything good. They destroy my people as if they were eating bread. They do not ask the Lord for help. because God is with those who do what is right. But the Lord will protect the poor. May the Lord give them back their riches. Then the people of Jacob will rejoice. And the people of Israel will be glad.
The Lord looked down from heaven at all the people.
But the wicked are filled with terror
The wicked upset the plans of the poor.
I pray that victory will come to Israel from Mount Zion!

15.verse_text: Lord, who may enter your Holy Tent? Who may live on your holy mountain? and who does what is right. He must speak the truth from his heart. He must do no wrong to his neighbors. He must not gossip. He must honor those who honor the Lord. He must keep his promises to his neighbor, even when it hurts. And he must not take money to hurt innocent people. Whoever does all these things will never be destroyed.
Only a person who is innocent
He must not tell lies about others.
He must not respect hateful people.
He must not charge interest on money he lends.

16.verse_text: Protect me, God, because I trust in you. Every good thing I have comes from you.' I enjoy them. I will not offer blood to those idols. I won"t even speak their names. He takes care of me. My part has been beautiful. Even at night, I feel his leading. Because he is close by my side I will not be hurt. Even my body has hope. You will not let your holy one rot. Being with you will fill me with joy. At your right hand I will find pleasure forever.
I said to the Lord, 'You are my Lord.
There are godly people in the world.
But those who turn to idols will have much pain.
No, the Lord is all I need.
My share in life has been pleasant.
I praise the Lord because he guides me.
I keep the Lord before me always.
So I rejoice, and I am glad.
This is because you will not leave me in the grave.
You will teach me God"s way to live.

17.verse_text: Lord, hear me begging for fairness. Listen to my cry for help. Pay attention to my prayer. I speak the truth. Your eyes can see what is true. You have tested me all night. You questioned me without finding anything wrong. I did not plan any evil. I have not done what evil people do. I have not failed. and you answer me. Listen to me now. Hear what I say. By your power you save from their enemies those who trust you. Protect me as a bird hides her young under her wings. Protect me from my enemies who surround me. They brag about themselves. Now they surround me. They plan to throw me to the ground. Like lions, they sit in hiding. Throw them down. Save me from the wicked with your sword. Their reward is in this life. They have plenty of food. They have many sons. They leave money to their children. When I wake up, I will see your likeness and be satisfied.
You will judge that I am right.
I have done what you told me to do.
Protect me as you would protect your own eye.
Keep me from the wicked who attack me.
They are like lions ready to kill.
Lord, rise up and face the enemy.
Lord, save me from them by your power.
Because I have lived right, I will see your face.

18.verse_text: I love you, Lord. You are my strength.

The Lord is my rock, my protection, my Savior. My God is my rock. I can run to him for safety. He is my shield and my saving strength, my high tower. He is worthy of praise. And I will be saved from my enemies. The deadly rivers overwhelmed me. The traps of death were before me. I cried out to my God for help. From his temple he heard my voice. My call for help reached his ears. The foundations of the mountains began to shake. They shook because the Lord was angry. Burning fire came out of his mouth. Burning coals went before him. Dark clouds were under his feet. He flew on the wings of the wind. surrounded by fog and clouds. They came with hail and lightning. God Most High raised his voice. And there was hail and lightning. His many bolts of lightning confused them with fear. The wind blew from your nose. The valleys of the sea appeared. The foundations of the earth were seen. He pulled me from the deep water. Those who hated me were too strong for me. But the Lord supported me. Because he delights in me, he saved me. Because I have not done evil, he has rewarded me. I have not done evil by turning away from my God. I have not broken his rules. I have kept myself from doing evil. I did what the Lord said was right. You are good to those who are good. But you are against those who are bad. But you make humble those who are proud. My God brightens the darkness around me. With God"s help I can jump over a wall. The Lord"s words are pure. He is a shield to those who trust him. Who is the Rock? Only our God. He makes my way free from fault. He helps me stand on the steep mountains. So my arms can bend a bronze bow. You support me with your right hand. You have stooped to make me great. My feet have not slipped. I did not quit till they were destroyed. They fell beneath my feet. You made my enemies bow before me. I destroyed those who hated me. but no one came to save them. They called to the Lord, but he did not answer them. They were like dust in the wind. I poured them out like mud in the streets. You made me the leader of nations. People I never knew serve me. Foreigners obey me. They tremble in their hiding places. May my Rock be praised. Praise the God who saves me! He brings people under my rule. You set me over those who hate me. You saved me from cruel men. I will sing praises to your name. He is loyal to his appointed king, to David and his descendants forever.
I will call to the Lord.
The ropes of death bound me.
The ropes of death wrapped around me.
In my trouble I called to the Lord.
The earth trembled and shook.
Smoke came out of his nose.
He tore open the sky and came down.
He rode a creature with wings and flew.
He made darkness his covering, his shelter around him,
Out of the brightness of his presence came clouds.
The Lord thundered from heaven.
He shot his arrows and scattered his enemies.
Lord, you spoke strongly.
The Lord reached down from above and took me.
He saved me from my powerful enemies.
They attacked me at my time of trouble.
He took me to a safe place.
The Lord spared me because I did what was right.
I have followed the ways of the Lord.
I remember all his laws.
I am innocent before him.
The Lord rewarded me because I did what was right.
Lord, you are loyal to those who are loyal.
You are pure to those who are pure.
You save those who are not proud.
Lord, you give light to my lamp.
With your help I can attack an army.
The ways of God are without fault.
Who is God? Only the Lord.
God is my protection.
He makes me like a deer, which does not stumble.
He trains my hands for battle.
You protect me with your saving shield.
You give me a wide path on which to walk.
I chased my enemies and caught them.
I crushed them so they couldn"t rise up again.
You gave me strength in battle.
You made my enemies turn back.
They called for help,
I beat my enemies into pieces.
You saved me when the people attacked me.
As soon as they hear me, they obey me.
They all become afraid.
The Lord lives!
God gives me victory over my enemies.
He saves me from my enemies.
So I will praise you, Lord, among the nations.
The Lord gives great victories to his king.

19.verse_text: The heavens tell the glory of God. And the skies announce what his hands have made. Night after night they tell it again. They don"t make any sound to be heard. It goes everywhere on earth. The sky is like a home for the sun. It rejoices like an athlete eager to run a race. and it follows its path to the other end. Nothing hides from its heat. They give new strength. The Lord"s rules can be trusted. They make plain people wise. They make people happy. The Lord"s commands are pure. They light up the way. That respect will last forever. The Lord"s judgments are true. They are completely right. even the purest gold. They are sweeter than honey, even the finest honey. Keeping them brings great reward. Forgive me for my secret sins. Don"t let them rule me. Then I can be pure and free from the greatest of sins. Lord, you are my Rock, the one who saves me.
Day after day they tell the story.
They have no speech or words.
But their message goes out through all the world.
The sun comes out like a bridegroom from his bedroom.
The sun rises at one end of the sky,
It is good to respect the Lord.
They are worth more than gold,
They tell your servant what to do.
No one can see all his own mistakes.
Keep me from the sins that I want to do.
I hope my words and thoughts please you.

20.verse_text: May the Lord answer you in times of trouble. May the God of Jacob protect you. May he support you from Mount Zion. May he accept all your sacrifices. Selah May all your plans succeed. We will raise a flag in the name of our God. May the Lord give you all that you ask for. He answers him from his holy heaven. He saves him with his strong right hand. But we trust the Lord our God. But we march forward and win. Answer us when we call for help.
May he send you help from his Temple.
May he remember all your offerings.
May he give you what you want.
We will shout for joy when you succeed.
Now I know the Lord helps his appointed king.
Some trust in chariots, others in horses.

21.verse_text: Lord, the king rejoices because of your strength. He is so happy when you save him! You did not refuse what he asked for. Selah You placed a gold crown on his head. And you gave it to him. His years go on and on. You gave him honor and praise. You made him glad because you were with him. Because God Most High always loves him, he will not be overwhelmed. Those who hate you will feel your power. In your anger you will eat them up. Your fire will burn them up. Their children will not live. But their traps won"t work. when you aim your arrows at them. We sing and praise your greatness.
You gave the king what he wanted.
You put good things before him.
He has great glory because you gave him victories.
The king truly trusts the Lord.
Your hand is against all your enemies.
When you appear, you will burn them like wood in a furnace.
You will destroy their families from the earth.
They made evil plans against you.
You will make them turn their backs
Be supreme, Lord, in your power.

22.verse_text: My God, my God, why have you left me alone? You are too far away to save me. You are too far away to hear my moans. But you do not answer. And I call at night. I am not silent. The praises of Israel are your throne. They trusted you, and you saved them. And they were rescued. They trusted you. And they were not disappointed. Men make fun of me. They look down on me. They stick out their tongues. They shake their heads. Maybe he will save you. If he likes you, maybe he will rescue you.' You made me trust you while I was just a baby. You have been my God since my mother gave birth to me. Now trouble is near, and there is no one to help. The strong bulls of Bashan are on every side. they open their jaws at me. like water poured out onto the ground. All my bones are out of joint. My heart is like wax. It has melted inside me. My tongue sticks to the top of my mouth. You laid me in the dust of death. Like dogs they have trapped me. They have bitten my arms and legs. People look and stare at me. and they threw lots for my clothing. You are my power. Hurry to help me. Save my life from the dogs. Save me from the horns of the bulls. I will praise you when your people meet to worship you. All you descendants of Jacob, honor him. Fear him, all you Israelites. the one who is in trouble. He doesn"t hide from him. He listens when the one in trouble calls out to him. These worshipers will see me do what I promised. Those who look to the Lord will praise him. May your hearts live forever! and will turn to the Lord. All the families of the nations will worship him. He rules the nations. Everyone will bow down to him. They will always be told about the Lord. People who are not yet born will hear what God has done.
My God, I call to you during the day.
You sit as the Holy One.
Our ancestors trusted you.
They called to you for help.
But I am like a worm instead of a man.
Everyone who looks at me laughs.
They say, 'Turn to the Lord for help.
You had my mother give birth to me.
I have leaned on you since the day I was born.
So don"t be far away from me.
Men have surrounded me like angry bulls.
Like hungry, roaring lions
My strength is gone
My strength has dried up like a piece of a broken pot.
Evil men have surrounded me.
I can count all my bones.
They divided my clothes among them,
But, Lord, don"t be far away.
Save me from the sword.
Rescue me from the lion"s mouth.
Then I will tell my brothers and sisters about you.
Praise the Lord, all you who worship him.
The Lord does not ignore
Lord, I praise you in the great meeting of your people.
Poor people will eat until they are full.
People everywhere will remember
This is because the Lord is King.
All the powerful people on earth will eat and worship.
The people in the future will serve him.
They will tell that he does what is right.

23.verse_text: The Lord is my shepherd. I have everything I need. He leads me to calm water. For the good of his name, he leads me on paths that are right. through a very dark valley, I will not be afraid because you are with me. Your rod and your shepherd"s staff comfort me. in front of my enemies. You give me more than I can hold. all my life. And I will live in the house of the Lord forever.
He gives me rest in green pastures.
You prepare a meal for me You pour oil of blessing on my head.
Surely your goodness and love will be with me

24.verse_text: The earth and everything in it belong to the Lord. The world and all its people belong to him. He set it on the rivers. Who may stand in his holy Temple? They must not have worshiped idols. They must not have made promises in the name of a false god. The God who saves them will declare them right. They look to the God of Jacob for help. Selah Open wide, you aged doors. Then the glorious king will come in. The Lord, strong and mighty. The Lord, the powerful warrior. Open wide, you aged doors. Then the glorious king will come in. The Lord of heaven"s armies– he is the glorious king. Selah
He built it on the waters.
Who may go up on the mountain of the Lord?
Only those with clean hands and pure hearts.
It is they who will receive a blessing from the Lord.

25.verse_text: Lord, I give myself to you.

My God, I trust you. Do not let me be disgraced. Do not let my enemies laugh at me. But those who sin without excuse will be disgraced. Show me how to live. Teach me, my God, my Savior. I trust you all day long. You have shown them since long ago. and wrong things I did when I was young. But remember to love me always because you are good, Lord. He points sinners to the right way. He teaches them his ways. for those who follow the demands of his agreement. forgive my many sins. The Lord will point him to the best way. His children will inherit the land. He tells them about his agreement. He will keep me from any traps. I am lonely and hurting. Free me from my problems. Take away all my sins. See how much they hate me! I trust you. Do not let me be disgraced. So may goodness and honesty guard me.
No one who trusts you will be disgraced.
Lord, tell me your ways.
Guide me in your truth.
Lord, remember your mercy and love.
Do not remember the sins
The Lord is good and right.
He shows those who are not proud how to do right.
All the Lord"s ways are loving and true
For the sake of your name, Lord,
Is there someone who worships the Lord?
He will enjoy a good life.
The Lord tells his secrets to those who respect him.
My eyes are always looking to the Lord for help.
Turn to me and be kind to me.
My troubles have grown larger.
Look at my suffering and troubles.
Look at how many enemies I have!
Protect me and save me.
My hope is in you.
God, save Israel from all their troubles!

26.verse_text: Lord, defend me. I have lived an innocent life. I trusted the Lord and never doubted. Look closely into my heart and mind. I live by your truth. I do not make friends with people who hide their sin. I won"t sit with the wicked. I come to your altar, Lord. I tell of all the miracles you have done. It is where your greatness is. Do not take my life with those murderers. They do wrong for money. So save me and be kind to me. Lord, I praise you in the great meeting.
Lord, try me and test me.
I do not spend time with liars.
I hate the company of evil people.
I wash my hands to show I am innocent.
I raise my voice in praise.
Lord, I love the Temple where you live.
Do not kill me with those sinners.
But I have lived an innocent life.
I stand in a safe place.

27.verse_text: The Lord is my light and the one who saves me. So why should I fear anyone? The Lord protects my life. So why should I be afraid? My enemies and those who hate me attack me. But they are overwhelmed and defeated. I will not be afraid. If war breaks out, I will trust the Lord. This is what I want: Let me live in the Lord"s house all my life. Let me see the Lord"s beauty. Let me look around in his Temple. He will hide me in his Holy Tent. Or he will keep me safe on a high mountain. than my enemies around me. I will offer joyful sacrifices in his Holy Tent. I will sing and praise the Lord. Be kind and answer me. So I come to worship you, Lord. Do not turn your servant away in anger. You have helped me. Do not push me away or leave me alone, God, my Savior. the Lord will take me in. Guide me to do what is right because I have enemies. They tell lies about me. They say they will hurt me. I will live to see the Lord"s goodness. Be strong and brave and wait for the Lord"s help.
Evil people may try to destroy my body.
I ask only one thing from the Lord.
During danger he will keep me safe in his shelter.
Lord, hear me when I call.
My heart said of you, 'Go, worship him.'
Do not turn away from me.
If my father and mother leave me,
Do not let my enemies defeat me.

28.verse_text: Lord, my Rock, I call out to you for help. Do not be deaf to me. If you are silent, I will be like those in the grave. when I cry out to you for help. I raise my hands toward your Most Holy Place. with those who do evil. They say, 'Peace' to their neighbors. But evil is in their hearts. They have done evil. Pay them back for what they have done. Give thanks to the Lord of all lords.
Only he can do great miracles.
With his wisdom he made the skies.
He spread out the earth on the seas.
He made the sun and the moon.
He made the sun to rule the day.
He made the moon and stars to rule the night.
He killed the firstborn sons of the Egyptians.
He brought the people of Israel out of Egypt.
He did it with his great power and strength.
He parted the water of the Red Sea.
He brought the Israelites through the middle of it.
But the king of Egypt and his army drowned in the Red Sea.
He led his people through the desert.
He defeated great kings.
He killed powerful kings.
He defeated Sihon king of the Amorites.
He defeated Og king of Bashan.
He gave their land as a gift.
It was a gift to his servants, the Israelites.
He remembered us when we were in trouble.
He freed us from our enemies.
He gives food to every living creature.
Give thanks to the God of heaven.

137.verse_text: By the rivers in Babylon we sat and cried when we remembered Jerusalem. we hung our harps. Our enemies wanted happy songs. They said, 'Sing us a Temple song from Jerusalem!' while we are in this foreign country! let my right hand lose its skill. if I do not remember you. Let these things happen if I do not think about Jerusalem as my greatest joy. on the day Jerusalem fell. They said, 'Tear it down! Tear it down to its foundations!' The people who pay you back will be happy. They will punish you for what you did to us. and throw them against the rocks.
Those who captured us asked us to sing.
But we cannot sing songs about the Lord
Let my tongue stick to the roof of my mouth
Lord, remember what the Edomites did
People of Babylon, you will be destroyed.

138.verse_text: Lord, I will thank you with all my heart. I will sing to you before the false gods. And I will thank you for your love and loyalty. You have made your name and your word greater than anything. You made me strong and brave. They have heard the words you speak. because the Lord"s glory is great. he takes care of those who are not proud. But he stays away from those who are proud. you will keep me alive. When my enemies are angry, you will reach down and save me by your power. Lord, your love continues forever. You made us. Do not leave us.
I will bow down facing your holy Temple.
On the day I called to you, you answered me.
Lord, let all the kings of the earth praise you.
They will sing about what the Lord has done
Lord, even when I have trouble all around me,
Lord, you do everything for me.

139.verse_text: Lord, you have examined me. You know all about me. You know my thoughts before I think them. You know well everything I do. you already know what I am going to say. You have put your hand on me. It is more than I can understand. Where can I run from you? If I lie down where the dead are, you are there. and settle in the west beyond the sea, With your right hand you would hold me. The light around me will turn into night.' The night is as light as the day. Darkness and light are the same to you. You formed me in my mother"s body. What you have done is wonderful. I know this very well. as I took shape in my mother"s body. When I was put together there, All the days planned for me were written in your book before I was one day old. They are so many! they would be more than all the grains of sand. When I wake up, I am still with you. Get away from me, you murderers! Your enemies use your name thoughtlessly. I hate those who rise up against you. They are my enemies. Test me and know my thoughts. Lead me in the way you set long ago.
You know when I sit down and when I get up.
You know where I go and where I lie down.
Lord, even before I say a word,
You are all around me–in front and in back.
Your knowledge is amazing to me.
Where can I go to get away from your Spirit?
If I go up to the skies, you are there.
If I rise with the sun in the east,
even there you would guide me.
I could say, 'The darkness will hide me.
But even the darkness is not dark to you.
You made my whole being.
I praise you because you made me in an amazing and wonderful way.
You saw my bones being formed
you saw my body as it was formed.
God, your thoughts are precious to me.
If I could count them,
God, I wish you would kill the wicked!
These men say evil things about you.
Lord, I hate those who hate you.
I feel only hate for them.
God, examine me and know my heart.
See if there is any bad thing in me.

140.verse_text: Lord, rescue me from evil people. Save me from cruel men. They always start fights. Their words are like snake poison. Selah Save me from cruel men who plan to trip me up. They have spread out a net beside the road. They have set traps for me. Selah Lord, listen to my prayer for help. you protect me in battle. Don"t let their plans succeed, or they will become proud. Selah Now let it come to them. Throw them into the fire or into pits from which they cannot escape. Let evil quickly hunt down cruel men. He will defend the needy in court. Honest people will live in his presence.
They make their tongues sharp as a snake"s.
Lord, guard me from the power of wicked people.
Proud men have hidden a trap for me.
I said to the Lord, 'You are my God.'
Lord, do not give the wicked what they want.
Those around me have planned trouble.
Let burning coals fall on them.
Don"t let liars settle in the land.
I know the Lord will get justice for the poor.
Good people will praise his name.

141.verse_text: Lord, I call to you. Come quickly. Listen to me when I call to you. Let my praise be like the evening sacrifice. Help me be careful about what I say. or join others in doing wrong. Don"t let me eat with those who do evil. If he corrected me, that would be like having perfumed oil on my head. I shouldn"t refuse it. But I pray against those who do evil. Then people will know that I have spoken the truth: In the same way, our bones have been scattered at the grave.' I trust in you. Don"t let me die. and from the net evil people have spread. And let me pass by safely.
Let my prayer be like incense placed before you.
Lord, help me control my tongue.
Don"t let me want to do evil
If a good man punished me, that would be kind.
Let their leaders be thrown down the cliffs.
'The ground is plowed and broken up.
Lord God, I look to you for help.
Protect me from the traps they set for me
Let the wicked fall into their own pits.

142.verse_text: I cry out to the Lord. I pray to the Lord for mercy. I tell him my troubles. you, Lord, know the way out. In the path where I walk, a trap is hidden for me. No one cares about me. I have no place of safety. No one cares if I live. I say, 'You are my protection. You are all I want in this life.' because I am helpless. Save me from those who are chasing me. They are too strong for me. Then I will praise your name. Then the good people will surround me because you have taken care of me.
I pour out my problems to him.
Lord, I cry out to you.

143.verse_text: Lord, hear my prayer. Listen to my cry for mercy. Come to help me because you are loyal and good. because no one alive is right before you. They have crushed me to the ground. They have made me live in darkness like those who are long dead. My courage is gone. I recall everything you have done. I think about all you have made. As a dry land needs rain, I thirst for you. Selah I am getting weak. Don"t turn away from me, or I will be like those who are dead. I trust you. Show me what I should do because my prayers go up to you. I come to you for safety. because you are my God. Let your good Spirit lead me on level ground. so people will praise you. In your goodness save me from my troubles. Destroy all those who trouble me because I am your servant.
I remember what happened long ago.
I lift my hands to you in prayer.
Tell me in the morning about your love.
Lord, save me from my enemies.
Teach me to do what you want,
In your love defeat my enemies.

144.verse_text: Praise the Lord, my Rock. He trains me for war. He trains me for battle. He is my place of safety and my Savior. He is my shield and my protection. He helps me rule my people. Why do you even think about a human being? His life is like a passing shadow. Touch the mountains so they will smoke. Shoot your arrows and force them away. Pull me out of this sea of enemies. Rescue me from these foreigners. They are dishonest. I will play to you on the ten-stringed harp. You save your servant David from cruel swords. They are liars. They are dishonest. grow like strong trees. Let our daughters be like the decorated stones in the Temple. with crops of all kinds. Let our sheep in the fields have thousands and thousands of lambs. Let no one break in. Let there be no war. Let there be no screams in our streets. Happy are the people whose God is the Lord.
He gives me love and protects me like a strong, walled city.
Lord, why is man important to you?
A man is like a breath.
Lord, tear open the sky and come down.
Send the lightning and scatter my enemies.
God, I will sing a new song to you.
Save me, rescue me from these foreigners.
Let our sons in their youth
Happy are those who are like this.

145.verse_text: I praise your greatness, my God the King. I will praise you forever and ever. I will praise you forever and ever. No one can understand how great he is. They will retell your mighty acts, And I will think about your miracles. I will tell how great you are. They will sing about your fairness. He does not become angry quickly but is full of love. He is merciful to all he has made. Those who belong to you will bless you. They will speak about your power. They will know about the glory and majesty of your kingdom. And you will be King from now on. The Lord will keep his promises. With love he takes care of all he has made. He takes care of those who are in trouble. And you give it to them at the right time. and you satisfy all living things. With love he takes care of all he has made. to all who truly pray to him. He listens when they cry, and he saves them. But he will destroy the wicked. Let everyone praise his holy name forever.
I will praise you every day.
The Lord is great. He is worthy of our praise.
Parents will tell their children what you have done.
wonderful majesty and glory.
They will tell about the amazing things you do.
They will remember your great goodness.
The Lord is kind and shows mercy.
The Lord is good to everyone.
Lord, everything you have made will praise you.
They will tell about the glory of your kingdom.
Then everyone will know what powerful things you do.
Your kingdom will continue forever.
The Lord helps those who have been defeated.
All living things look to you for food.
You open your hand,
Everything the Lord does is right.
The Lord is close to everyone who prays to him,
He gives those who fear him what they want.
The Lord protects everyone who loves him.
I will praise the Lord.

146.verse_text: Praise the Lord! My whole being, praise the Lord. I will sing praises to my God as long as I live. or other people, who cannot save you. Then all of their plans come to an end. Their hope is in the Lord their God. the sea and everything in it. He remains loyal forever. He gives food to the hungry. The Lord sets the prisoners free. The Lord lifts up people who are in trouble. The Lord loves those who do right. He defends the orphans and widows. But he overthrows the wicked. Jerusalem, your God is everlasting. Praise the Lord!
I will praise the Lord all my life.
Do not put your trust in princes
When people die, they are buried.
Happy are those who are helped by the God of Jacob.
The Lord does what is fair for those who have been wronged.
The Lord gives sight to the blind.
The Lord will be King forever.

147.verse_text: Praise the Lord! It is good to sing praises to our God. It is good and pleasant to praise him. He brings back the scattered Israelites who were taken captive. He bandages their wounds. and names each one. There is no limit to what he knows. But he throws the wicked to the ground. Praise our God with harps. He sends rain to the earth. He makes grass grow on the hills. and to the little birds that call. or the power of a man. with those who trust his love. Jerusalem, praise your God. He blesses the people inside. He fills you with the finest grain. and it quickly obeys him. He scatters the frost like ashes. No one can stand the cold he sends. He sends the breezes, and the waters flow. He gave his laws and demands to Israel. They don"t know his laws. Praise the Lord!
The Lord rebuilds Jerusalem.
He heals the brokenhearted.
He counts the stars
Our Lord is great and very powerful.
The Lord defends those who are not proud.
Sing praises to the Lord.
He fills the sky with clouds.
He gives food to cattle
He is not pleased by the strength of a horse
The Lord is pleased with those who fear him,
Jerusalem, praise the Lord.
He makes your city gates strong.
He brings peace to your country.
He gives a command to the earth,
He spreads the snow like wool.
He throws down hail like rocks.
Then he gives a command, and it melts.
He gave his word to Jacob.
He didn"t do this for any other nation.

148.verse_text: Praise the Lord! Praise the Lord from the heavens. Praise him high above the earth. Praise him, all you armies of heaven. Praise him, all you shining stars. and you waters above the sky. because they were created by his command. He made a law that will never end. Praise him, you large sea animals and all the oceans. and stormy winds that obey him. fruit trees and all cedar trees. small crawling animals and birds. princes and all rulers of the earth. old people and children. He alone is great. He is greater than heaven and earth. He should be praised by all who belong to him. He should be praised by the Israelites, the people closest to his heart. Praise the Lord!
He set them in place forever and ever.
Praise the Lord from the earth.
Praise him, lightning and hail, snow and clouds,
Praise him, mountains and all hills,
Praise him, you wild animals and all cattle,
Praise him, you kings of the earth and all nations,
Praise him, you young men and women,
God has given his people a king.

149.verse_text: Praise the Lord! Sing a new song to the Lord. Sing his praise in the meeting of his people. Let the people of Jerusalem rejoice because of their King. They should praise him with tambourines and harps. He saves those who are not proud. Let them sing for joy even in bed! with their two-edged swords in their hands. They will defeat the people. and those important men in iron bands. God is honored by all who worship him. Praise the Lord!
Let the Israelites be happy because of God, their Maker.
They should praise him with dancing.
The Lord is pleased with his people.
Let those who worship him rejoice in his glory.
They will put those kings in chains
They will punish them as God has written.

150.verse_text: Praise the Lord! Praise God in his Temple. Praise him in his mighty heaven. Praise him for his greatness. Praise him with harps and lyres. Praise him with stringed instruments and flutes. Praise him with crashing cymbals. Praise the Lord!
Praise him with tambourines and dancing.
Let everything that breathes praise the Lord.
